menu.title: Thai Rolls
menu.description: Crispy springrolls filled with chicken or vegetables, served with house sweet sauce (available vegetarian).

menu.title: Ravioli
menu.description: Steamed bite size pork and vegetable ravioli, served with ginger soy sauce.

menu.title: Scallion Pancake
menu.description: Crispy vegetarian pancake served with ginger soy sauce.

menu.title: Crab Rangoon
menu.description: Crispy wonton filled with crabmeat, onion, carrot and cream cheese, served with pineapple sauce.

menu.title: Tempura
menu.description: An assortment of vegetables or bite size chicken dipped in tempura batter, fried until golden brown, served with house sweet sauce.

menu.title: Cozy Shrimp
menu.description: Marinated whole shrimp spring rolls served with pineapple sauce.

menu.title: Satay Skewers
menu.description: Choice of marinated chicken or beef on bamboo sticks, served with homemade peanut sauce.

menu.title: Combo Platter
menu.description: Vegetarian Spring Rolls, crab rangoons, spicy wings, cozy shrimp, vegetable tempura, chicken satay and ravioli.

menu.title: Koo Chai
menu.description: Thai style vegetarian dumplings filled with chives, fried or steamed, served with spicy ginger soy sauce.

menu.title: Fried Calamari
menu.description: Lightly battered calamari rings, served with sweet chili sauce.

menu.title: Chicken Fingers
menu.description: Bite size chicken dipped in tempura batter, fried until golden brown, served with sweet and sour sauce.

menu.title: Spicy Wings
menu.description: Golden fried and glazed with sweet tangy spicy sauce.

menu.title: Fried Wonton

menu.title: Tom Yam

menu.title: Tom Khar

menu.title: Chicken Noodle

menu.title: Seafood Rice

menu.title: Pad Thai

menu.title: Sukiyaki Soup
